mapper.select: SELECT name,participator_num,start_time,end_time,"max",votes.id,votes.updated_at,votes.type FROM votes,users,vote_records WHERE vote_records.user_id = #{userId} and vote_records.vote_id = votes.id and creator_id = users.id
SELECT * FROM votes WHERE id = #{id} AND is_deleted = FALSE AND visibility_limit = TRUE
SELECT id,title,type,start_time,end_time,max,participator_num FROM votes WHERE is_deleted = FALSE AND visibility_limit = TRUE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO votes (title, description, anonymous, participator_limit, visibility_limit, start_time, end_time, creator_id, created_at, updated_at, password,type,max) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{anonymous}, #{participatorLimit}, #{visibilityLimit}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{creatorId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{password},#{type},#{max});
